TermDefinition.DefinitionText: The tumor was in the liver only and all of the cancer was removed by surgery.

MediaLink.alt: Pronunciation of dictionary term "stage I childhood liver cancer"
Pronunciation of dictionary term "cáncer de hígado infantil en estadio I"

GlossaryTerm.SpanishTermName: cáncer de hígado infantil en estadio I

SpanishTermDefinition.DefinitionText: El tumor estaba solo en el hígado y se extirpó todo el cáncer mediante cirugía.
